Name: Secreted Proteins Via GO Annotation And WoLF PSORT For shCTSB Paper
Tools:
GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1, wolf_psort, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, tp_sorted_uniq, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
term_id_vs_term_name, tp_cut_tool, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
Convert characters1, tp_easyjoin_tool, bg_uniq, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
get_subontology_from, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, uniprot
